title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 290 - Incorporation Of Regulations Of The State Tax Commission With Respect To Article 22 Of The Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 290 - Incorporation Of Regulations Of The State Tax Commission With Respect To Article 22 Of The Tax Law

State Regulations
§ 290.1 - General
§ 290.2 - Regulations of the State Tax Commission

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 290

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1312[a]; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §
11-1797

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
